title: Air Campaign Against ISIS Continues As Rebels Look To Regroup
teaser: Air strikes continue against ISIS and the U.S. is considering establishing a no-fly zone in Syria to protect civilians and allow rebels to regroup. Arun Rath talks to NPR's Deborah Amos and Leila Fadel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
